text:
@GrandpaSnarky Maybe Trump raised the quality of life for rich & corrupt Americans.

Hey @NikkiHaley! Trump hasn't raised my quality of life.
Food prices higher amid stagnant wages
Racists spewing hate openly
GOP covering up crimes of a corrupt president, destroying our country
Covid-19 rampant
